title: Everything you want and MORE! 1028 sq ft 2 bed, 1.5 bath available!
neighborhood: Near to Shops of 25 Minute Drive to Newman Wetlands Center
posting_body: ['Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes', '501 Roberts Dr Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Pricing:', '$1249 - $1415/Month*', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '1.5', 'Square Footage:', '1028 sq ft', 'show contact info', 'Features in this apartment home:', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ Range', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '➢ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '➢ Eat-in Kitchen', '➢ Private Patio or Balcony', '➢ Vinyl Flooring', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Window Coverings', 'About the community:', 'Emerald Pointe delivers large 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in Clayton County.', 'French doors open onto private patios or balconies in this great location just minutes from downtown Atlanta.', 'Amenities at our property:', '➢ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Grill', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Online Services', '➢ On-Site Management', '➢ Playground', '➢ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '➢ Sun Deck', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ Clothes Care Center/Laundry Facilities', '➢ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '➢ Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '➢ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '➢', 'Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '➢ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '➢ Monthly Pest Control', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Resident Referral Program', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions 25lbs.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by Peak Living', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '619E1DC5B7734938']
